article_title: Rubio: My Vote Against Military Action in Syria
article_text:
Published on Sep 4, 2013

U.S. Senator Marco Rubio (R-FL) speaks at a Senate Foreign Relations meeting about why he believes the U.S. should avoid military action in Syria and instead help the Syrian people to replace their government. Learn more: http://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/in...
